tool_description: ADSBexchange.com traffic feed for flight simulators
name: ADSBx Flight Sim Traffic
title: ADSBx Flight Sim Traffic

api_list.name: LiveTraffic
api_list.description: Returns all aircraft within 25nm radius of specified Lat/Lon

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude (-180 to 180) Hint: US is negative longitude!
